entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
